passage_text: 1 ounce = about 28.35 grams. 1 gram = 0.03 oz. 6 oz x 28.35 grams/ounce equals about 170.1 grams.
170.09 g 1 ounce = about 28.35 grams 1 gram = 0.03 oz 6 oz x 28.35 grams/ounce equals about 170.1 grams. Here is the formula: 6 oz | * | 28.34952313 g 1 oz | = | 170.

The conversion factor for weight units grams to ounces (oz) is 0.0352739619. For troy ounces, it is 0.0321507466. To find out how many ounces in a gram, multiply by the conversion factor or simply use the converter below. 1 Gram = 0.0352739619 Ounce. Gram is a commonly used metric system unit of mass. It is one thousandth (1/1000) of the metric system base unit, kilogram.

To find out how many grams in ounces, multiply by the conversion factor or simply use the converter below. 1 Ounce = 28.3495231 Grams. Ounce is a unit of mass (weight) in united states customary and imperial measurement systems. It is also used as a volume unit but then simply meant as fluid ounces which equals to about 30 milliliters in U.S. customary system.
